DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the performance and acceptability of a new blood glucose monitoring system, which includes meter and sensor strip.
DOC.brief_title: Performance of a New Glucose Meter System
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or 2 diabetes Age 18 years or older Routinely performs blood glucose self testing at home, at least once per day Able to speak, read, and understand English. Is willing to complete all study procedures Currently pregnant Hemophilia or any other bleeding disorder Taking prescription anticoagulants or has clotting problems that may prolong bleeding. Taking aspirin daily is not excluded Subject employee of competitive medical device company Cognitive disorder or other condition, which in the opinion of the investigator, would put the person at risk or seriously compromise the integrity of the study
